from bsm_company_supplier where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and supplier_status IN ( 1, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 )

boss_name = #{bossName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fund = #{fund,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
